Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.diary.core

Class Diary.Query

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.diary.core.Diary.Query
Enclosing class:
Diary
public static class Diary.Query extends Object
Gives a functionality to filter notes that belong to the outer Diary. Time of creation restrictions are provided by after(ZonedDateTime) and before(ZonedDateTime), and checks for keywords being contained in a note title are done by containsInHeading(String) and containsInHeading(List).

Can be instantiated only by Diary.query() method of the outer class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Diary.Query
    after(ZonedDateTime date)
    Filters out notes that are created after a specified date and returns this instance.
    Diary.Query
    before(ZonedDateTime date)
    Filters out notes that are created before a specified date and returns this instance.
    Diary.Query
    containsInHeading(String keyword)
    Filters out notes that doesn't contain a specified keyword or one of other that had been specified before and returns this instance.
    Diary.Query
    containsInHeading(List<String> keywordsList)
    Filters out notes that doesn't contain at least one keyword from specified keyword or one of other that had been specified before and returns this instance.
    Diary
    select()
    Processes the query and returns a new instance of a Diary.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
